languages.text: "Исключено. Я не позволю им ускользнуть из хватки закона вновь".
"That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."
languages.original_text: "Исключено. Я не позволю им ускользнуть из хватки закона вновь".

traits.locale_text: "That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."
"That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."
"That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."
"That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."
"That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."
"That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."

languages.text: “想都别想，我绝不会让那些人再次逃避法律的制裁。”
languages.original_text: "That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."

traits.locale_text: “想都别想，我绝不会让那些人再次逃避法律的制裁。”

languages.text: 「問題外だ。もう二度と、彼らを法の手から逃がさない」
languages.original_text: "That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."

traits.locale_text: 「問題外だ。もう二度と、彼らを法の手から逃がさない」

languages.text: «Eso no va a pasar. No dejaré que vuelva a escapar de las garras de la ley».
languages.original_text: "That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."

traits.locale_text: «Eso no va a pasar. No dejaré que vuelva a escapar de las garras de la ley».

languages.text: "Das kommt nicht in Frage. Ich lasse nicht zu, dass sie der Gerechtigkeit erneut entkommen."
languages.original_text: "That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."

traits.locale_text: "Das kommt nicht in Frage. Ich lasse nicht zu, dass sie der Gerechtigkeit erneut entkommen."

languages.text: « Hors de question. Je ne les laisserai pas échapper encore une fois à la justice. »
languages.original_text: "That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."

traits.locale_text: « Hors de question. Je ne les laisserai pas échapper encore une fois à la justice. »

languages.text: "Söz konusu bile olamaz. Kanunun elinden bir kez daha kaçmalarına izin vermeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "That is out of the question. I will not let them slip from the law's grasp again."

traits.locale_text: "Söz konusu bile olamaz. Kanunun elinden bir kez daha kaçmalarına izin vermeyeceğim."
